description.text: This iron ring has several sharp barbs. If the wearer can cast summon monster spells, the wearer adds augur to the 3rd-level list of monsters he can summon with those spells, adds sacristan to the 7th-level list, and adds interlocutor to the 9th-level list. Also, once per day on command the wearer can use this ring to summon an augur, as if by the summon monster III spell.
